question: Prasar Bharati has signed MoU with which Union Ministry to launch over 50 education TV channels?
option1: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
answer: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s public broadcaster Prasar Bharati has recently entered into an MoU with the Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.
The MoU, which aims to launch 51 direct-to-home (DTH) education TV channels, has been signed between Prasar Bharati and Bhaskaracharya National Institute for Space Applications and Geo-Informatics under MEITY.
